mapper.select: select distinct areaname from area_code order by areaname
select sigunguname from area_code where areaname = #{areaname} and sigunguname is not null

select e.sigunguname, d.sigungucode, d.m2, d.firstimage from area_code e, (select b.sigungucode, b.m2, c.firstimage, b.areacode from tour_inquiry c, (select a.sigungucode, max(t.contentid) m2, a.areacode from tour_inquiry t, (select sigungucode, max(readcount) m, areacode from tour_inquiry where areacode = #{areacode} group by sigungucode, areacode) a where a.m = t.readcount group by a.sigungucode, a.areacode) b where b.m2=c.contentid) d where e.sigungucode = d.sigungucode and e.areacode = d.areacode order by sigunguname
select distinct areacode from area_code where areaname = #{areaname}
select distinct areacode, sigungucode from area_code where areaname=#{areaname} and sigunguname = #{sigungu}

select e.* from (select ROWNUM as RNUM, d.* from (select * from (select distinct b.addr1, b.areacode, b.cat1, b.cat2, b.cat3, b.contentid, b.contenttypeid, b.firstimage, b.firstimage2, b.modifiedtime, b.mapx, b.mapy, b.readcount, b.sigungucode, b.tel, b.title, b.zipcode, c.cat3_name from area_code a inner join tour_inquiry b on a.sigungucode = b.sigungucode inner join content_code c on b.cat3 = c.cat3 where b.areacode=#{areacode} and b.sigungucode=#{sigungucode}) )d )e where e.RNUM>=#{startNum} and e.RNUM<=#{endNum}
